name: Panam Palmer
info:
• 简体中文名: 帕南·帕尔默
  • 性别: 女
  • 引用来源: https://cyberpunk.fandom.com/wiki/Panam
detail: Panam Palmer is a character in the upcoming video game Cyberpunk 2077. She is said to be a partner of V's during at least one mission fairly early on. Not much as of now outside of her being an ex-nomad and now a merc is known.
